effect.name: Bloom
effect.description: Blurs the image's highlights and applies them to the image.
effect.author: Looki

parameter.name: Radius
parameter.description: Radius of the blur in pixels.

parameter.name: Exponent
parameter.description: The exponent used to compute the highlights.

parameter.name: Coefficient
parameter.description: After the exponent is applied, the result is multiplied with this number.
